00092 {
00093    int i = 0;
00094    char device[16];
00095    int file_descriptor;
00096 
00097    sprintf(device, deviceFormat, i);
00098 
00099    while ((file_descriptor=open(device, O_RDWR)) != -1)
00100    {
00101       /* we opened a device, find its properties */
00102       int retval;
00103       struct v4l2_capability caps;
00104 
00105       if ((retval = ioctl(file_descriptor, VIDIOC_QUERYCAP, &caps)) >= 0)
00106       {
00107          printf("Device %d (%s) is a v4l2 device\n", i, device);
00108          printf("Driver name is: %s\n", caps.driver);
00109          printf("Card name is: %s\n", caps.card);
00110          printf("Bus position: %s\n", caps.bus_info);
00111          printf("Version: %d.%d.%d\n", caps.version >> 16 & 0xFF, caps.version >> 8 & 0xFF, caps.version & 0xFF);
00112 
00113 #if defined(V4L2_CAP_DEVICE_CAPS)
00114          printf("Driver capabilities:\n");
00115          DumpCaps(caps.capabilities, "  ");
00116          if (caps.capabilities & V4L2_CAP_DEVICE_CAPS)
00117          {
00118             printf("Device capabilities:\n");
00119             DumpCaps(caps.device_caps, "  ");
00120          }
00121 #endif
00122          printf("\n");
00123          // Enumerate inputs:
00124          {
00125             struct v4l2_input ip;
00126 
00127             ip.index = 0;
00128             while (ioctl(file_descriptor, VIDIOC_ENUMINPUT, &ip) == 0)
00129             {
00130                ip.index++;
00131                printf("Input %d has name: %s\n", ip.index, ip.name);
00132             }
00133             printf("There are %d input(s) on this device.\n\n", ip.index);
00134          }
00135          // Enumerate standard controls
00136          {
00137             struct v4l2_queryctrl qc;
00138             int i = 0;
00139             qc.id = V4L2_CID_BASE;
00140             while (qc.id <= V4L2_CID_LASTP1)
00141             {
00142                if (ioctl(file_descriptor, VIDIOC_QUERYCTRL, &qc) == 0)
00143                {
00144                   i++;
00145                   if (qc.flags & V4L2_CTRL_FLAG_DISABLED)
00146                   {
00147                      // Control is disabled, move onto the next.
00148                      printf("Control %s is disabled\n", qc.name);
00149                      qc.id++;
00150                      continue;
00151                   }
00152                   printf ("Control %s has minimum of %d and maximum of %d\n", qc.name, qc.minimum, qc.maximum);
00153                }
00154                qc.id++;
00155             }
00156             printf("There are a total of %d standard controls\n\n", i);
00157          }
00158          // Enumerate custom controls (i.e. generic parameters which aren't in the V4L2 control list)
00159          {
00160             struct v4l2_queryctrl qc;
00161             int i=0;
00162             qc.id = V4L2_CID_PRIVATE_BASE;
00163             while (ioctl(file_descriptor, VIDIOC_QUERYCTRL, &qc) == 0)
00164             {
00165                i++;
00166                if (qc.flags & V4L2_CTRL_FLAG_DISABLED)
00167                {
00168                   // Control is disabled, move onto the next.
00169                   printf ("Private Control %s is disabled\n", qc.name);
00170                   qc.id++;
00171                   continue;
00172                }
00173                printf ("Private Control %s has minimum of %d and maximum of %d\n", qc.name, qc.minimum, qc.maximum);
00174                qc.id++;
00175             }
00176             printf ("There are a total of %d custom controls\n", i);
00177          }
00178 
00179 
00180       } else {
00181          printf("Retval was %d with errno as %d\n", retval, errno);
00182          printf("Device %d (%s) isn't a v4l2 device\n", i, device);
00183          goto next;
00184       }
00185 next:
00186       printf ("\n");
00187 
00188       close(file_descriptor);
00189       i++;
00190       sprintf(device, deviceFormat, i);
00191    }
00192    printf("\nEnumerated %d capture devices\n", i);
00193 }
